title: Lab Tests in Psychopharmacology
itunes:title: Lab Tests in Psychopharmacology
description:
Laboratory testing is essential in the practice of psychopharmacology. For example, which parameters should be monitored in patients taking carbamazepine, TCAs, atypical antipsychotics, or esketamine?

Guest: Sandra Jacobson, M.D.;
Interviewer: Mohan Gautam., D.O.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D.; Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Laboratory Testing in the Practice of Psychopharmacology - Interview with Sandra A. Jacobson, M.D.
